name: resume-schema
description: A JSON schema for a resume

contactInformation.description: The person's contact information might include firstName, lastName, email, phone, address, city, xtate, zipCode, country

firstName.description: The person's first name, such as 'John' or 'Jane'

lastName.description: The person's last name, such as 'Doe' or 'Smith'

email.description: The person's email address, such as 'job@doe.com'

phone.description: The person's optional phone number, such as '555-123-4567'

address.description: The person's optional street address, such as '123 Main St.'

city.description: The person's optional city, such as 'San Francisco'

state.description: The person's optional state or province, such as 'CA' or 'NY'

zipCode.description: The person's optional zipCode or postalCode, such as '94105' or '90210'

country.description: The person's optional country, such as 'USA' or 'Canada'

workHistory.description: The person's work history as a list of workHistoryItems sorted by their workDurations

items.name: workHistoryItem
items.description: a period of work including workPositionOrTitle, workForCompanyName, workLocationOrRemote, workDuration, workResponsibilitiesAccomplishments

workPositionOrTitle.description: The position or professional title of the person, while working at this compnay, such as 'Software Engineer' or 'Data Scientist'

workForCompanyName.description: The name of the company the person worked for

workLocationOrRemote.description: The location of where the person worked for the company, like 'San Francisco, CA', Or 'Remote' if the person worked from home

wprkDuration.description: The optional start and end dates of the person's' employment at the company, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM' or 'YYYY'

workStart.description: The start date of the person's employment at the company

workEnd.description: The end date of the person's employment at the company

workResponsibilitiesAccomplishments.description: A list of sentences describing the person's responsibilities or noteable accomplishments during their time at the company

items.name: workResponsibilitiesAccomplishmentsItem
items.description: A sentence describing one of the person's responsibilities or noteable accomplishments achieved during their time at the company

educationHistory.description: A list of the person's education history, including institutions, degrees and majors

items.name: educationHistoryItem
items.description: An item in a person's education history, including institution, degree and major

institution.description: The name of the institution the person attended, such as 'Stanford University' or 'UC Berkeley'

degree.description: The degree the person earned at the institution, such as ('BS' or 'Bachelor of Science'), or ('MFA' or 'Master of Fine Arts')

majors.description: An optional comma-separated list of majors of the person's degree, such as 'Computer Science' or 'Art History'

minors.description: An optional comma-separated list of minors of the person's degree, such as 'Computer Science' or 'Art History'

gradePointAverage.description: The optional grade point average (GPA) the person earned while attending the institution, such as '3.5' or 'B+'

duration.description: The optional start and end dates of the person's attendance at the institution, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM' or 'YYYY'

start.description: The optional start date of the person's attendance at the institution

end.description: The optional end date of the person's attendance at the institution

skills.description: An optional comma-separated list of the person's skills, such as 'Python', 'Machine Learning', 'React', 'Data Analysis'

certifications.description: An optional comma-separated list of the person's certifications, such as 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect', 'Google Analytics Certified'

publications.description: An optional list of the person's publications, such as books, articles, or research papers

patents.description: An optional list of the person's patents or inventions

items.description: An optional list of the person's websites or online profiles, such as LinkedIn, GitHub, or a URL to their personal website
